author: redigaffi
content: Hello guys, not sure if this is the correct place, but how can I develop an android app with metamask and web3?

author: redigaffi
content: If I want my android app to interact with a smart contract I would need something like metamask on android, but metamask is only for browser

author: zkfloof
content: <@!248919883155243008> this discord is mostly R&D focused but a good place to ask would be the CryptoDevs discord: https://discord.gg/5W5tVb3

author: protolambda
content:
Some resources that may help:
- lots of community docs: https://docs.ethhub.io/
- about dapps: https://ethereum.org/en/dapps/
- eth1 protocol core, state representation: https://dzone.com/articles/ethereum-yellow-paper-walkthrough-27
- https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-20
- eth2.info
- eth2.news
- https://benjaminion.xyz/eth2-annotated-spec/
- https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs
